ONE_FILE_ALLOWED: drop just one audio clip on the pad
CANT_TRIM_FILE:
this file can't be trimmed any further.
try with a lower threshold value first
UPDATE_USER_INFO: if you want to update your email or password you will need to introduce your current password
FORGOT_PASSWORD_EMAIL: we'll send you an email to recover your password
VERIFY_EMAIL: please verify your email. you can't post any kit with an unverified email address
UNIQUE_USERNAME: username already in use. choose another one.
PLAY_TO_DOWNLOAD: you need to play in order to download or share
SHARE_TO_YT_PLAYLIST: share to our YouTube playlist. We will manually review your kit and publish it to our Youtube channel if it works perfectly
